section.name: Jadabs-CLDC MIDlet Applications
section.p: During the semester work following CLDC/MIDP MIDlets have been implemented:

tr.td: Application that uses the SMS-Gateway component
Demo application for JXME BT Transport
Application for testing the JSR-82 implementation on mobile phones
Application for testing whether MIDlets can be executed concurrently

section.p: Additionally foreign source code has been integrated into the Jadabs-CLDC tree, just in order to able to build the target with the Maven-Antenna-Plugin.
